EmailTemplate.name: New Complaint Management Case Notification To Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: You have a new support case! Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Support Case
This confirms that we have received your request for support.
California Environmental Protection Agency Environmental Complaint System
New Support Case
{!Case.Contact} This confirms that we have received your request for support. In order for us to provide quality service, we have assigned your issue the following Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Our support team should contact you within 2 business days. If you would like to add comments, please reply to this message, or ensure that {!Case.CaseNumber} is somewhere in the subject or body of the email. Thank You, CalEPA Complaint Help Desk ref:{!Case.Id}
